original_title: Tove Jansson et les doux Moomins de Finlande
overview: Once upon a time, there were strange little creatures, somewhere between trolls and hippos, that inhabited a quiet green valley in Finland. The Moomins, created by the writer Tove Jansson, remain in the hearts of people the world over as an ode to family and childhood.
title: Tove Jansson and the Moomins
